ca.mcgill.ecse321.TreePLE.controller

Class TreeManagerRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse321.TreePLE.controller.TreeManagerRestController

  • @RestController
public class TreeManagerRestController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is what connects our FrontEnd to our BackEnd. It handles all REST services requests made by the user and calls the corresponding service method needed to complete the request. It uses Dto's in order to never expose the frontend to our main model classes.
    Author:
    Ilana Haddad

      Constructors

      • createTree

        @PostMapping(value={"/newTree/{species}","/newTree/{species}/"})
public TreeDto createTree(@PathVariable(value="species")
                                                                                           java.lang.String species,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(name="height")
                                                                                           double height,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(name="diameter")
                                                                                           double diameter,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(name="municipality")
                                                                                           MunicipalityDto munDto,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(name="latitude")
                                                                                           double latitude,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(name="longitude")
                                                                                           double longitude,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(name="owner")
                                                                                           java.lang.String ownerName,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(name="age")
                                                                                           int age,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(name="landuse")
                                                                                           Tree.LandUse landuse)
                                                                                    throws InvalidInputException
        This method is mapped to the POST request URI to create a tree. It calls the service method createTree and converts its result to a Dto before returning it to the frontend.
        Parameters:
        species -
        height -
        diameter -
        munDto -
        latitude -
        longitude -
        ownerName -
        age -
        landuse -
        Returns:
        TreeDto
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException

        Returns:

      • createNewForecast

        @PostMapping(value={"/newForecast/{name}","/newForecast/{name}/"})
public ForecastDto createNewForecast(@PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                        java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                        @RequestParam(name="baseVersion")
                                                                                                        java.lang.String baseVersion,
                                                                                                        @RequestParam(name="futureYear")
                                                                                                        int futureYear,
                                                                                                        @RequestParam(name="treesToPlant",required=false)
                                                                                                        java.util.List<TreeDto> treesToPlantDto,
                                                                                                        @RequestParam(name="treesToCutDown",required=false)
                                                                                                        java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> treeIdsToCutDown)
                                                                                                 throws InvalidInputException
        This method is mapped to the POST request URI to create a new forecast. It calls the service method updateTreeData and converts its result to a Dto before returning it to the frontend.

        baseVersion -

      • createTreeDto

        @PostMapping(value={"/newTreeDto/{species}","/newTreeDto/{species}/"})
public TreeDto createTreeDto(@PathVariable(value="species")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String species,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(name="height")
                                                                                                    double height,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(name="diameter")
                                                                                                    double diameter,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(name="municipality")
                                                                                                    MunicipalityDto munDto,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(name="latitude")
                                                                                                    double latitude,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(name="longitude")
                                                                                                    double longitude,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(name="owner")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String ownerName,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(name="age")
                                                                                                    int age,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(name="landuse")
                                                                                                    Tree.LandUse landuse)
                                                                                             throws InvalidInputException
        Method used for forecast, need to create treeDto's in order to pass them to the list of treesToPlant
        Parameters:
        species -
        height -
        diameter -
        munDto -
        latitude -
        longitude -
        ownerName -
        age -
        landuse -
        Returns:
        TreeDto created
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException
